import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './ArtistPage.css'; const ArtistPage = () => { const [ displayClowns, setDisplayClowns ] = useState({ modalOne: false, modalTwo: false, modalThree: false }) const displayClownsOne = () => { setDisplayClowns({ modalOne: !displayClowns.modalOne}); (displayClowns.modalOne === true) ? document.getElementById('ClownOne').style.display = 'block' : document.getElementById('ClownOne').style.display = "none" } const displayClownsTwo = () => { setDisplayClowns({ modalTwo: !displayClowns.modalTwo}); (displayClowns.modalTwo === true) ? document.getElementById('ClownTwo').style.display = 'block' : document.getElementById('ClownTwo').style.display = 'none' } const displayClownsThree = () => { setDisplayClowns({ modalThree: !displayClowns.modalThree}); (displayClowns.modalThree === true) ? document.getElementById('ClownThree').style.display = 'block' : document.getElementById('ClownThree').style.display = "none"; } return (
